EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Insights: The Future of Banking, AI, Crypto and More
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We notice that you attended some of our webinars in 2021. We hope NCR’s perspectives and insights from industry expert on the hottest trends and topics helped accelerate your digital banking strategy. If you’re looking to read more about the future of digital-first banking, check out the new issue of NCR’s digital-first magazine, Accelerate. It’s hot off the press and loaded with expert insights. Inside, you’ll find an exclusive interview with NCR’s CTO, Tim Vanderham, on the future of cryptocurrency and what financial institutions need to know to cut through the clutter—and stay competitive.
